publ: by Joe Polk at Engaged Leadership Solutions
name: EngagedLeadersFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to weekly updates about employee engagement and engaged leadership from your favorite source. Each week a different influencer of employee engagement is addressed and what engaged leaders can do to influence employee engagement. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
